attributes.description:
With VW Polokwane Master Cars we give our customers total peace of mind; every car is checked in our workshop by a qualified VW Technician and undergo a 80 point quality check. 

Everything that needs to be done is done to the vehicle before you take delivery. We are committed to making your purchase experience as easy as possible and are happy to take any trade-in, however old, organize finance for you and any of our other products that will help your ownership experience to be effortless. 

Nation wide delivery

attributes.description:
2022 ISUZU D-MAX250D-TEQ DOUBLE CAB ENGINE VERY CLEAN NICE SEAT Mileage: 1500 km. Color: White Price: R359, 995 Neg


BLACKLISTED ARE ALSO WELCOME TO APPLY FOR FINANCE


Features: AUTOMATIC, NICE SEAT INTERIOR As Good As New Car, 3x3 Point Rear Seat Belts, Driver airbag and Passenger airbag, Adjustable Seats, With Spare Tire, Wheel, 18’’ inch Meg’s, Smash & grab, Anti theft system, ABS, Airbags, Air condition, Spotless, Nice In Color Low Mileage On Clock, Central Locking, and Gear Locking, New Tires, Alloy Wheel's, Spotlights In Front, Alarm and Mobilize Power Steering, and Adjustable steering, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Aircon, Factory fitted Louder Mp3 Radio, Car Very Clean Inside And Outside, with Average Fuel of 7.1 liter per 100km. Excellent Body Condition, Excellent Interior Condition, Excellent Mechanical Condition, Excellent Overall Condition. This car is still very clean and has a Road worthy certificate. 


Definitely A Must See Please Call/WhatsApp DE REV AUTOS to View All Vehicle.

1. We stock a wide variety of quality, used, low kilometer vehicles such as sedans, hatchbacks, SUVs and bakkies 
2. All our second hand vehicles for sale undergo a stringent 116-point quality assurance check 
3. Over 1,000 popular makes and models of used cars available 
4. Finance and Insurance arranged on the spot
5. Finance available with all banks Neat and Immaculate Condition.
 
Going for both CASH / FINANCE! If you would like to come view or tests drive the vehicle, we are situated at 658 LOUIS BOTHA AVEUNE WYNBERG SANDTON JOHANNESBURG 2090. Operating hours are from 08:00 till 17:00 Mon - Fri and 08:00 till 14:00 Sat. ALTERNATIVE CONTACT: CALL 011 485 1186 OR WHATS APP 0784890344, 0810023905

attributes.description: This vehicle is absolutely spotless, NEW SHAPE AMG SPORT PERFECTLY ORIGINAL AND IMMACULATE IN EVERY WAY. THE COMBINATION IS JUST SO STUNNINGLY BEAUTIFUL. THIS CAR TURNS HEADS. Fullservice history, every service completed on schedule and up to date with MERCEDES, WHICH EQUALS 100 PERCENT PEACE OF MIND. Calcite White, Black Leather Upholstery is like new and finished with Satin Silver Trim. FULLY LOADED WITH ALL THE MERCEDES BENZ OPTIONAL EXTRAS including MERCEDEZ BENZ ILS Intelligent light system with L.E.D signature MultiFunctional Sports Leather Steering, Parktronic front, and rear, Comfort seat package with full leather package, electric folding mirrors, media interface package with AUDIO 20 SOUND, Auto armor smash and grab . Perfectly Looked after by the responsible previous owner, 4 MERC APPROVED RUN FLAT TYRES ARE IN EXCELLENT CONDITION This A180 engine offers brilliant power and CRAZY LIGHT ON FUEL. It is difficult to find a late model A180 AMG SPORT AUTO with good mileage in this price range. Must be seen to be appreciated. DEKRA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
